name: Void Vanguard
description:
A simple 2D space shooter based on too many other space shooters to name, and some bullet hell games.

This game was made in 2 months, following set guidelines for the GameDevHQ course I'm currently doing, but where I could I tried to add my own twists to the gameplay.

I hope you enjoy it.

Note: There is a bug where sometimes one of the Sentries can appear slightly off-screen during the boss fight phase 2. It is still destroyable and should not break the game. I won't fix this for now because I'm busy, but may in future.

P.S. If you find any bugs (particularly game-breaking ones), please let me know. Thank you.
